definition: a narrow marking of a different color or texture from the background, mark with spots or blotches of different color or shades of color as if stained
details:
noun
- a narrow marking of a different color or texture from the background
= synonyms: bar
- a distinctive characteristic
= example: a distinctive characteristic
- a sudden flash (as of lightning)
- an unbroken series of events
= example: an unbroken series of events
= synonyms: run
verb
- mark with spots or blotches of different color or shades of color as if stained
= synonyms: blotch, mottle
- run naked in a public place
- move quickly in a straight line
= example: move quickly in a straight line
